languages.text:
Новые компоненты можно добыть из многих источников — в боях, во время событий, в колониях или у торговца в системе Фурибундус, предварительно подняв свою {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}репутацию{/g} с фракцией.
Помимо сменяемых есть 2 системных компонентов, части корабельной конструкции, которые нельзя менять, но можно улучшать.
Еще одним ограничением является необходимость установки двух разных типов оружия в {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} слоты — два одинаковых не будут работать совместно.

There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.
languages.original_text:
Новые компоненты можно добыть из многих источников — в боях, во время событий, в колониях или у торговца в системе Фурибундус, предварительно подняв свою {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}репутацию{/g} с фракцией.
Помимо сменяемых есть 2 системных компонентов, части корабельной конструкции, которые нельзя менять, но можно улучшать.
Еще одним ограничением является необходимость установки двух разных типов оружия в {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} слоты — два одинаковых не будут работать совместно.

traits.locale_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect as rewards from your colonies, or purchase from the merchant in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot instal two weapons of the same type in the prow slots.

There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect as rewards from your colonies, or purchase from the merchant in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot instal two weapons of the same type in the prow slots.

There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a merchant in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot instal two weapons of the same type in the prow slots.

There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

languages.text:
Es gibt viele Wege, neue Schiffskomponenten zu erlangen – du kannst sie als Kriegsbeute einsammeln, bei bestimmten Ereignissen erhalten, als Belohnungen von deinen Kolonien einsammeln oder von einem {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}Händler{/g} im Furibundus-System beziehen, solange die Stufe deines Rufs bei der entsprechenden Fraktion hoch genug ist.
Abgesehen von ersetzbaren Komponenten verfügt dein Raumschiff auch über zwei Systemkomponenten – Elemente der Schiffskonstruktion, die nicht ersetzt werden aber ein Upgrade erhalten können.
Es besteht eine weitere Einschränkung: Du kannst nicht zwei Waffen desselben Typs in den {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}-Slots installieren.
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

traits.locale_text:
Es gibt viele Wege, neue Schiffskomponenten zu erlangen — du kannst sie als Kriegsbeute einsammeln, bei bestimmten Ereignissen erhalten, als Belohnungen von deinen Kolonien einsammeln oder von einem Händler im Furibundus-System beziehen, solange die Stufe deines {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Rufs{/g} bei der entsprechenden Fraktion hoch genug ist.
Abgesehen von ersetzbaren Komponenten verfügt dein Raumschiff auch über zwei Systemkomponenten — Elemente der Schiffskonstruktion, die nicht ersetzt werden aber ein Upgrade erhalten können.
Es besteht eine weitere Einschränkung: Du kannst nicht zwei Waffen desselben Typs in den {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}-Slots installieren.

languages.text:
Il existe de nombreuses façons d'obtenir de nouveaux composants pour vaisseaux. Vous pouvez les récupérer comme butin de guerre, les recevoir lors de certains événements, les obtenir en guise de récompenses de la part de vos colonies ou les acheter auprès d'un {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}marchand{/g} du système de Furibundus, à condition d'avoir une réputation suffisante auprès de sa faction.
En plus des composants remplaçables, votre vaisseau spatial possède deux composants système, des éléments structurels du vaisseau qu'il n'est pas possible de remplacer, mais qui peuvent être améliorés.
Il existe une autre limite : vous ne pouvez pas installer deux armes du même type dans les emplacements de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g}.
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

traits.locale_text:
Il existe plusieurs façons d'obtenir de nouveaux composants pour vaisseaux. Vous pouvez les récupérer comme butin de guerre, les recevoir lors de certains événements, les obtenir en guise de récompenses de la part de vos colonies ou les acheter auprès d'un marchand du système de Furibundus, à condition d'avoir une {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} suffisante auprès de sa faction.
En plus des composants remplaçables, votre vaisseau spatial possède deux composants système, des éléments de structure du vaisseau qu'il n'est pas possible de remplacer, mais qui peuvent être améliorés.
Il existe une autre limite : vous ne pouvez pas installer deux armes du même type dans les emplacements de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g}.

languages.text:
您可以通过很多途径获得新的舰船组件，可以从战斗中获得，可以通过特定事件获得，可以从殖民地处获得，也可以从怒焰星系的{g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}商人{/g}手中购买，前提是您在该阵营之中的声望够高。
除了可替换的组件之外，您的虚空舰还有两项系统组件。这些系统组件是舰船的基本结构，无法进行替换，但可以进行升级。
此外，您无法在{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器槽中装备多个相同类型的武器。
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

traits.locale_text:
您可以通过很多途径获得新的舰船组件，可以从战斗中获得，可以通过特定事件获得，可以从殖民地处获得，也可以从怒焰星系的商人手中购买，前提是您在该阵营之中的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}够高。
除了可替换的组件之外，您的虚空舰还有两项系统组件。这些系统组件是舰船的基本结构，无法进行替换，但可以进行升级。
此外，您无法在{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器槽中装备多个相同类型的武器。

languages.text:
Existen muchas maneras de obtener nuevos componentes para tu nave. Se pueden conseguir en botines de guerra, recibir en ciertos acontecimientos, encontrar entre las recompensas de tus colonias o comprarlas a un {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}mercader{/g} del sistema Furibundus, siempre que tengas la reputación suficiente con su facción.
Además de sus componentes reemplazables, tu naves del vacío también tiene dos componentes de sistema, es decir, elementos de su estructura que solo se pueden mejorar en lugar de reemplazar.
Todo esto, sin embargo, entraña una limitación: no se pueden instalar dos armas del mismo tipo en las ranuras de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g}.
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

traits.locale_text:
Existen muchas maneras de obtener nuevos componentes para tu nave. Se pueden conseguir en botines de guerra, recibir en ciertos acontecimientos, encontrar entre las recompensas de tus colonias o comprarlas a un mercader del sistema Furibundus, siempre que tengas la {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} suficiente con su facción.
Además de sus componentes reemplazables, tu naves del vacío también tiene dos componentes de sistema, es decir, elementos de su estructura que solo se pueden mejorar en lugar de reemplazar.
Todo esto, sin embargo, entraña una limitación: no se pueden instalar dos armas del mismo tipo en las ranuras de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g}.

languages.original_text:
New components can be obtained from many sources — in battles, during events, in colonies or from a merchant in the Footfall system, having previously raised your reputation with the faction.
In addition to the replaceable ones, there are 2 system components, parts of the ship's construction that cannot be changed but can be improved.
Another limitation is the need to install two different types of weapons in the bow slots — two of the same type will not work together.

languages.text:
新たな船の部品を入手するには多くの方法がある。戦争の戦利品として収集、一部のイベントで受領、コロニーから報酬として獲得、あるいは、勢力からの評価が高ければ、フリブンダスシステムで{g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}商人{/g}より購入することができる。
交換可能な部品とは別に、ヴォイドシップには2つのシステムがある。船の構造の一部で、交換不可だがアップグレードが可能。
また別の制約もある。{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}には同じタイプの武器を2つ搭載することはできない。
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.

traits.locale_text:
新たな船の部品は様々な方法で入手できる。戦争の戦利品として収集、一部のイベントで受領、コロニーから報酬として獲得、あるいは、勢力からの{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評価{/g}が高ければ、フリブンダスシステムで商人より購入することができる。
交換可能な部品とは別に、ヴォイドシップには2つのシステムがある。システムは船の構造の一部で、交換不可だがアップグレードすることができる。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}には同じタイプの武器を2つ搭載することはできない。

languages.text:
Yeni gemi bileşeni elde etmenin pek çok yolu bulunur. Onları savaş ganimeti olarak toplayabilir, belirli olaylar sırasında edinebilir, kolonilerinden ödül olarak alabilir veya Furibundus Sistemi'ndeki bir {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}tüccardan{/g} (mensubu olduğu fraksiyondaki itibarın yeterince yüksekse) satın alabilirsin.
Değiştirilebilen bileşenlerin haricinde uçsuz geminin iki de sistem bileşeni bulunur. Geminin bu temel unsurları değiştirilemeseler de terfi ettirilebilirler.
Bir başka sınırlama daha mevcuttur: {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Pruva{/g} yuvalarına aynı türden iki silah yerleştiremezsin.
languages.original_text:
There are many ways to obtain new ship components — you can collect them as spoils of war, receive during certain events, collect them as rewards from your colonies, or purchase them from a {g|Encyclopedia:VendorsAndReputationGlossary}merchant{/g} in the Furibundus System, as long as you have sufficiently high reputation with their faction.
Apart from replaceable components, your voidship also has two system components — elements of the ship's structure that cannot be replaced but can be upgraded.
There is one more limitation: you cannot install two weapons of the same type in the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} slots.
